title: One a.m.
creator_credit: Lone Star Corporation, Van Beuren Corporation, Charles Chaplin and Henry P. Caulfield
brief_description: Charlie Chaplin at his slapstick best in the role of a drunk who unable to find his house keys climbs in through the window and ends up in a series of comic situations and confrontations. Cast also includes Albert Austin. No dialogue, music only.
creator_credit_for_label: Lone Star Corporation, Van Beuren Corporation, Charles Chaplin and Henry P. Caulfield
